This site is powered by the InformationKruncher's KrunchServer. The goal of this project is to design a service that meets the following criteria:
Built purely using international standards
Is extensible
Is fault tolerant, and secure
Works the same in every standard operating environment
Must be legible, and designed to accomadate the needs of any competent computer programmer.

Certain features found in many mainstream product lines, that are not a goal of the KrunchServer include, but are not limited to:
Ability to work with systems that are designed to be incompatible with international standards
Methods to promote any sinkhole of support
Techniques to hobble the product, or cause it to be dysfunctional in support of forced upgrades or other sales efforts
